# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ProteinDataBank_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(ProteinDataBank)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ProteinDataBankPluginInfo.C
ProteinDataBankCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
ProteinDataBankPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ProteinDataBankMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtProteinDataBankFileFormat.C
avtProteinDataBankOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ProteinDataBankEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtProteinDataBankFileFormat.C
avtProteinDataBankOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IProteinDataBankDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IProteinDataBankDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IProteinDataBankDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MProteinDataBankDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MProteinDataBankDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MProteinDataBankDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MProteinDataBankDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EProteinDataBankDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EProteinDataBankDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EProteinDataBankDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EProteinDataBankDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EProteinDataBankDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EProteinDataBankDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EProteinDataBankDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EProteinDataBankDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases ProteinDataBank ${INSTALLTARGETS})
